response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a considerable discount. I trust this offer aligns well with your financial planning and strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
